column4: Hey, where is the Wine directory where you install things and they end up?
or ctrl+h in nautilus (the file manager)
I'm looking for like a way I can use the file viewer.
what are you trying to do?
I'm trying to move a file I Installed in the "invisable" C:\blah dir of wine.
so go to home folder, view hidden files, then go in .wine
I did. I went to View -> Show Hidden Files. Then I se more in /. I Don't see a .wine. I looked in home and all I see is the username of the account.
unless you're configuring the system, everything you do will be inside that folder
Ahh thats Extremely good to know!
And I take it files with . in front are supposed to be "hidden"?
